summary: The implementation provides a complete e-commerce fashion store with fullscreen homepage carousel, product catalog, shopping cart, and vanguardist design aesthetic using #a932bd. All core requirements are implemented with appropriate backend storage and frontend pages. However, there are some issues with cart persistence and data structure implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Product data persists across canister upgrades
missing_requirements.reason: Backend uses non-stable Map structures without stable variables or preupgrade/postupgrade hooks. Data will be lost on canister upgrade.

missing_requirements.requirement: Cart quantities can be updated or items removed
missing_requirements.reason: Cart update/remove mutations in useCart.ts do not properly persist changes. The updateQuantityMutation filters items but doesn't recreate the cart, and removeFromCartMutation only filters without updating backend state.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'User account creation or authentication beyond Internet Identity' is a non-goal, yet full II provider and hooks are implemented
No requirement specified blob storage or external blob handling. The backend imports and includes MixinStorage functionality not requested in BuildRequest.
